name: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
description: Baby lost Mommy when Baby was too young to remember Mommy 's face. But Baby remembers how warm and cuddly sleeping in Mommy 's hug felt. Now, Baby has to sleep with all the mommies in order to find Mommy. It could be any mommy. It could be your mommy...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
